name: lockerweb

scripts.dev: concurrently -p "[{name} / {time}]" -c "green,blue,magenta" -n "client,server(tsc),server" "pnpm run -r --filter=client dev " "pnpm run -r --filter=server watch" "pnpm run -r -filter=server dev"
scripts.delete: pnpm run --filter=client delete && pnpm run --filter=server delete
